properties.name: Child Care Works
properties.description: Posted by Paceinc 105 William St., New Bedford, MA 02740We are a community service organization that works with parents, childcare providers, businesses, and community organizations to help promote the availability of quality childcare services in the area. We provide parents with child care referrals and information on evaluating quality childcare, plus resources on various parenting issues. We offer childcare providers access to valuable training and support services for new or established programs. For directions to our office, click here.

properties.name: PACE Head Start at Madison Street
properties.description: Posted by Paceinc32 Madison St., New Bedford, MA 02740Head Start children benefit from a comprehensive approach to early care and education that supports and enhances the development of both the child and the family. This approach includes a creative education curriculum, comprehensive health services, parent education, meaningful parent involvement and family support services. Part and full day preschool options are available at Head Start. Children are free to explore, experiment, socialize, problem solve, master new skills and gain self confidence while guided by qualified early childhood professionals in a classroom environment. All children enrolled at PACE Head Start receive nutritious meals and snacks. Free bussing services are available to and from school. A small fee based on family income is charged to parents whose children are enrolled in the full day option. Child care vouchers are also accepted for full day services. Ten percent of enrollment opportunities are reserved for children with special needs. For more information or an application, call Family Services at 508 999-1286 or 508 984-3557. For directions to our office, click here.

properties.name: The Family Center
properties.description: Posted by Paceinc 361 Cedar Grove St., New Bedford, MA 02746Since 1993, The Family Center has been a place where people gather to share information and ideas about parenting. It\'s a place to find a caring friend, a helping hand or a listening ear. The Family Center believes all families can benefit from parenting information and support. Parents who participate in Family Center activities will have the opportunity to: connect and share ideas with other parents learn what to expect as their children grow improve communication with their children strengthen family relationships learn positive discipline techniques develop stress management skills Family Center programs are provided free-of-charge and On-site child care is available for classes and workshops when noted. While The Family Center staff believes there is no one right way to parent, all families can benefit from parenting information and support. Parents who participate in Center activities will have the opportunity to: Learn effective discipline techniques Improve family relationships Learn how to communicate with their children Develop stress management skills Learn what to expect as their children grow Connect and share ideas with other parents The Family Center services are provided free-of-charge to all families living in New Bedford. On-site child care is available for all activities. Please call in advance to register for programs, 1-508-979-1927. The Family Center is a program of PACE Child Care Works in collaboration with the New Bedford Public Schools and is funded by the Massachusetts Department of Education. To get directions to our office, click here.

properties.name: Welcome to PACE, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Paceinc  166 William St., New Bedford, MA 02740PACE, Inc. helps individuals and families in poverty achieve economic security and family stability. PACE, Inc. provides access to opportunities through advocacy,a wide range of program service resources, and education and training to assist people in the process of self sufficiency. PACE, Inc. services include: Advocacy and Housing, Child Care Works, Elder Housing Services, Emergency Food Bank, Fuel Assistance,Head Start, Youthbuild New Bedford, andThe Family Center. PACE, Inc has been providing human services for Greater New Bedford since 1982. To get directions to our office, click here

properties.name: YouthBuild New Bedford
properties.description: Posted by Paceinc58 Crapo St., New Bedford, MA 02740YouthBuild New Bedford is an educational program designed to provide 16- to 24-year-olds residents an opportunity to learn valuable occupational and life management skills. YouthBuild New Bedford uses construction training, leadership development, and academic preparation as tools to teach the values of discipline, integrity, and work. To get ditections to our office click here
